wikipedia_page.main:
Sam Ellis (born 23 June 1982) is a British 800 metres runner from Barnsley. He won a bronze medal in the 800 m at the 2006 European Athletics Championships. He is coached by Alan Hastey and is on the World Class Podium funding programme.
Ellis attended Penistone Grammar School and is a graduate from Sheffield Hallam University in Architecture.
